page.title: 11 LABOUR SAVING
page.content:
People now have much more leisure time. There are more electrical gadgets around the house, mixers, food processors, fridge_freezers and microwave ovens mean a meal can be produced quickly. Automatic washers, dryers and dishwashers up dated vacuum cleaners mean housework is done more quickly. Men do more in the house to help.
In offices photo_copiers, computers and modern robots do the job that took several people a long time.Therefore, lots of people work shorter hours or even lose their jobs altogether. This means more sports centres and garden centres are opening like the new one in the Trading Estate at Buywell.
